title: The Elvin Bishop Band - Rock My Soul (1972; 2002) [FLAC]
description:
2002 CD re-issue including the 1972 album plus one bonus track from the same sessions.


tracklist:

1. Rock My Soul
2. Holler and Shout
3. Let it Shine
4. Don't Mind If I Do
5. Rock Bottom
6. Last Mile (Instrumental)
7. Have a Good Time
8. Wings of a Bird
9. Old Man Trouble
10. Out Behind the Barn
11. Stomp (Instrumental)

Bonustrack
12. Sit and Wonder (Previously Unreleased ) 


lineup:

Elvin Bishop - guitars, lead vocals
Jo Baker - lead vocals
Steve Miller - organ, piano
Kip Maercklein - bass
Bill Meeker - drums
Dennis Marcellino, Mel Ellison - tenor sax
Milt Holland - percussion
Delaney Bramlett - rhythm & slide guitar
Perry Welsh . harmonica
Bobby Bruce - fiddle solo
Jim Gordon - clarinet
Ron Stallings - vocal & sax on track 2
Delaney and Bonnie, Jo Baker, Clydie King, Vanetta Fields, Gloria Jones, Perry welsh, Shirley Matthews - background vocals
